strapiPost.title: Holiday weekend plans
strapiPost.content:
Here is whats happening this weekend in Northwest Arkansas

Friday (today)

  • Arkansas Public Theatre in Rogers is playing the movie Frozen.
  • The Arkansas & Missouri Railroad Holiday Express ride Friday through Sunday, in Springdale.

Saturday

  • Morning - The Winter Market on the Bentonville square
  • Afternoon - Downtown Rogers Holiday Market
  • Afternoon - Christmas on the Creek in downtown Springdale
  • Afternoon - Walton Arts Center in Fayetteville plays White Christmas.
  • Evening - Christmas Parade of the Ozarks in Springdale

Sunday

  • Parade of Trees in downtown Springdale
